Add tile-level metadata to a matching cell-level Seurat object

Source: R/utils_analysis.R
AddTileMetadata.Rd

Add tile-level metadata to a matching cell-level Seurat object

Usage

AddTileMetadata(obj, tile_obj, ..., by = c(tile_id = "id"))

Arguments

obj

A Seurat object containing cell-level data with a tile_id metadata column.

tile_obj

A Seurat object containing tile-level data.

...

Tidy expressions specifying which metadata columns from tile_obj to add to obj. For example, tile_size = npts

by

A named character vector specifying how to join obj and tile_obj. Defaults to c('tile_id' = 'id'), where tile_id is the metadata column in obj and id is the metadata column in tile_obj.

Value

The input Seurat object with additional tile-level metadata added to @meta.data.

On this page
